Name: Gypsy Cocktail
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
15 ml Chilled water reduce if wet ice
Instructions: MUDDLE rosemary and raisins with gin in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: Jason's original recipe called for raisin infused gin and I'd recommend you make this drink that way if time permits.
History: Adapted from a recipe created by Jason Fendick in 2002 for Steam, London, England.
